The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Tropical wagtail
Tropical wagtail
Released21 November 2006 (Update)
Combat level19
MembersYes
LocationFeldip Hunter area
ExamineIt blends in very well with its surroundings.
Advanced data
NPC ID5548

The tropical wagtail is a green bird that players can capture with the Hunter skill at level 19 or above, granting 95.2 Hunter experience.

Hunter info[edit | edit source]

Tropical wagtail
Level required 19
Hunter XP95.2 xp
RetaliationNo
TrapBird snare
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always620
Raw bird meat1Always2510
Stripy feather5–10Always40–8060–120

The catch rate is 29% at lvl 1 and 144% at lvl 99.[1]

Hunting technique[edit | edit source]

A tropical wagtail being caught.

The hunting technique is the same as for other birds. Players must set up a bird snare and wait until a bird gets stuck in it. Players may repeatably use the same bird snare. Bird snares are available for purchase in Hunter shops.

Multiple traps[edit | edit source]

Bird snaring can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum amount of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

Traps
1 1
20 2
40 3
60 4
80 5

Description[edit | edit source]

Parts of this article are copyrighted by Jagex.
It has a direct quote, copied verbatim, from Old School RuneScape or the Old School RuneScape website.
“ This beautiful bird can be found in hot jungle climates where it expertly catches small insects for food. It is perhaps therefore ironic that it is usually caught for its bright plumage, which can be used in turn to make excellent fly fishing lures. ”
 
— William Oddity's Guide to the Avian
